metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10181 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: It was found that in icedtea-web up to and including 1.7.2 and 1.8.2executable code could be injected in a JAR file without compromising thesignature verification. An attacker could use this flaw to inject code in atrusted JAR. The code would be executed inside the sandbox.

criterions.comment: icedtea-web package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
